item.description: Traffic - DOUBLE FATALITY; INC#1590; 07:25PM; 9500 N Lurline Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JK9Il6; Chatsworth; Auto vs bicycle (reported as hit and run) with two patients. Sadly both patients were determined dead on scene. The original 9-1-1 call was received at 7:14PM. All questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Inc# 3236 Devonshire Division and LA County Coroner for identification.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; E107 RA107 RA96; CH8; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0123; 03:32AM; 3700 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JE0gje; Historic South-Central; KNOCKDOWN: 52 firefighters extinguished the fire in one hour and six mins. The fire was contained to the scrubber system (used to remove harmful materials from industrial exhaust gases before they are released into the environment). It is believed there was a build-up of lint within the system that ignited (similar to a dryer fire). No injuries reported. Crews will remain on scene, ensuring there are no remaining hot spots within the system prior to concluding the incident. No further details.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 CM22 E15 E21 E210 E215 E221 E294 E295 E33 E87 RA15 RA246 SQ21 SQ87 SQ95 T10 T15 T21 T94 T95; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire ; INC#0123; 02:26AM; 3700 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JE0gje; Historic South-Central; Large, two story commercial building, (doing business as "MatchMaster Inc", a textile dyeing and finishing company) with fire within the scrubber system being held in check by fire sprinkler. The fire is currently contained within one stack of the system and has not extended to the structure itself. Due to the system involved, this is being handled as a structure fire 'with a hazmat component'. ; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 CM22 E15 E21 E210 E215 E221 E294 E295 E33 E87 RA15 SQ21 SQ87 SQ95 T10 T15 T21 T94 T95; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Physical Rescue ; INC#1700; 08:11PM; Sb 5 Tr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sSMT8O; Sylmar; Multi-car collision with a current patient count of four: 16yo F and 18yo F with minor, non-life threatening injuries, 20 yo M and 17yo M with what appear to be minor injuries but due to the mechanism of injury (car over the side) meet trauma criteria and are not able to walk up the hillside. Firefighters are evaluating the most efficient approach to bringing them to the ambulance (possibly a litter basket operation off the truck if ground access can't be made via a service road). CHP Log # 2380. No further details.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; E275 E91 EM15 RA898 RA91 T75 UR88 RA18 RA828 BC12 ; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1568; 07:01PM; 6429 N Gentry Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pTbfO5; North Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: 33 firefighters extinguished the fire in 14 minutes. Crews located fire in one room and knocked it down with no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E239 E260 E278 E289 E89 RA39 T39 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1568; 06:47PM; 6429 N Gentry Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pTbfO5; North Hollywood; One story, single family dwelling with heavy smoke showing from the attic. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. One additional task force requested.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E289 E89 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0085; 02:06AM; 1712 E 41st Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/34hVJTu; Central-Alameda; KNOCKDOWN: 47 firefighters extinguished both fires in 29 minutes. Firefighters conducted thorough searches of both structures to ensure no victims were inside (the 2nd story of the two story craftsman was too damaged to allow for a search). No injuries reported. $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 CM22 E14 E17 E21 E215 E221 E233 E46 EM1 RA14 SQ21 T15 T21 T33; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0085; 01:38AM; 1712 E 41st Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/34hVJTu; Central-Alameda; Large, outside fire extended into two separate single family dwellings. A one story residence is well involved in fire and a two story (craftsman style) residence has a well developed attic fire. Additional resources were requested (reflected in this alert).; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 CM22 E14 E17 E21 E215 E221 E233 E46 EM1 RA14 SQ21 T15 T21 T33; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

title.a: FIRE NOW OUT Structure Fire 01/02/2022 INC#1498

item.description: FIRE NOW OUT Structure Fire; INC#1498; 08:04PM; 718 S Union Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zkNS2X; Westlake; The first arriving fire companies extinguished fire in one unit of a four story (pre-1943) center hall apartment building in 10 mins. The fire was contained to the original unit and prevented from damaging other units. No injuries reported. The 9-1-1 call was received at 7:54PM. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E10 E13 E210 E211 EM11 RA11 RA13 RA811 SQ21 T10 T11 T9; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue; INC#0726; 12:39PM; 2899 E Observatory Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EOZMTE; Griffith Park; Firefighters and Park Rangers located an adult female hiker with a non-life threatening injury. LAFD Air Ops is preparing for a hoist operation and hospital transport. The initial 9-1-1 call was received at 12:09PM. No further details.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E35 H1 H4 HA1 HA4 RA35 RH114 T35; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart
